subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: After a nine-year trophy drought, Arsenal, which crushed Aston Villa on Saturday, has now won the Cup two years in a row to overtake Manchester United, which has won 11 titles.
snippet: After a nine-year trophy drought, Arsenal, which crushed Aston Villa on Saturday, has now won the Cup two years in a row to overtake Manchester United, which has won 11 titles.
